nodes.body:
Perhaps the current name was meant as a parallel to the existing `Lean.Name.getString!` in core? https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/blob/61a84c96db4ef76ebcd7b1510c5b7c7f1cf81212/src/Lean/Data/Name.lean#L20-L22
(In any case, I think your change in this PR makes it a lot clearer.)

> Perhaps the current name was meant as a parallel to the existing `Lean.Name.getString!` in core? [leanprover/lean4@`61a84c9`/src/Lean/Data/Name.lean#L20-L22](https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/blob/61a84c96db4ef76ebcd7b1510c5b7c7f1cf81212/src/Lean/Data/Name.lean#L20-L22) (In any case, I think your change in this PR makes it a lot clearer.)

Ah, good find! I'll see if I can rename that, too.

Whatever you choose, this is an improvement.

bors d+

Oops, too much copy and paste.
